entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected Saturday morning when 1 to 3 cm may accumulate on the road above 800 metres. Note, snow flurries are possible at times during the remainder of Saturday, but is not expected to accumulate on the road.
